info.title: Djobea Analytics API
info.description: API documentation for Djobea Analytics platform - A comprehensive service provider management system

get.description: Retrieve dashboard statistics, charts, and recent activity
Retrieve paginated list of service providers with filtering

post.description: Add a new service provider to the system

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific provider

delete.description: Remove a provider from the system

post.description: Send a message to a provider via various communication methods

get.description: Retrieve list of available providers for assignment
Retrieve paginated list of service requests with filtering
Retrieve detailed information about a specific request

post.description: Assign a service request to a specific provider

providerId.description: ID of the provider to assign

put.description: Update the status of a service request

post.description: Generate PDF invoice for a completed request
